segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and I can't help but feel surprised that she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in that puddle, but her expression is so calm and collected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly up to something, but she seems utterly unaware of their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried the boy is going to fall off that stool any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting with her hand out, so eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s amusing how children can be so bold, yet also so innocent in their intentions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the dish was the only thing that captured her focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the puddle expanding at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR
